New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi snapped his eight successive T20Is without a first-over wicket with a perfect illustration of why he has historically been so effective up front.
Key Match Events: Gareth Delany and Mark Adair gritted their way through a 44-run partnership off 30 balls
Pakistan's collapse came after they were cruising through the chase with Saim Ayub, Mohammad Rizwan and Babar doing their bit to take any sting out of Ireland's bowling attack
Shaheen back in love with first overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan fans with a message for their team in Lauderhill
Shaheen back in love with first overs after going eight successive T20Is without a first-over wicket
Pakistan's jitters as they collapsed in the chase
Others: Imad Wasim took care of the lower order with figures of 3 for 8 in four overs, in what is likely his last game for Pakistan
Shaheen finished with two heaved sixes to seal a win that gave Pakistan relief rather than satisfaction
